Flying, lifelink, protection from black, green and red [i](This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything black, green and red.)[/i]
Haunt [i](When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)[/i]
Haunted creature is a 6/6 white and blue Spirit Dragon with flying, lifelink, and protection from black, green and red, and you control that creature. [i](This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything black, green and red, and you control that creature.)[/i]
